mapper.insert: insert into t_info_slideshow_home ( slideshow_id, slideshow_num, slideshow_path, start_time, end_time, goods_id, is_delete, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user, version ) values ( #{slideshowId}, #{slideshowNum}, #{imagePath}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{goodsId}, #{isDelete}, now(), #{createUser}, now(), #{updateUser}, 0 )
mapper.update: update t_info_slideshow_home set slideshow_state_id = #{slideshowStateId}, update_time = now(), update_user = #{updateUser}, version = version + 1 where slideshow_id = #{slideshowId} and version = #{version}

select g.goods_id goodsId, g.goods_name goodsName, g.goods_state_id goodsStateId, c1.classify_name oneClassifyName, c2.classify_name twoClassifyName from t_info_slideshow_home s left join t_info_goods g on s.goods_id = g.goods_id left join t_info_goods_classify c1 on g.one_classify_id = c1.classify_id and c1.is_delete = 0 left join t_info_goods_classify c2 on g.two_classify_id = c2.classify_id and c2.is_delete = 0 where s.is_delete = 0
and goods_name like concat('%', #{goodsName}, '%')
and goods_id like concat('%', #{goodsId}, '%')

select slideshow_num slideshowNum, slideshow_path slideshowPath, slideshow_state_id slideshowStateId, start_time startTime, end_time endTime, slideshow_id slideshowId, version from t_info_slideshow_home where is_delete = 0
and slideshow_state_id like concat('%', #{slideshowStateId}, '%')
